tournamentPlayerRejoined

void tournamentPlayerRejoined(Table table,
                              GenericPlayer player)
Invoked when a player has rejoined the table. This means that a player who has been disconnected is now back. Note that this method will only be invoked for players already sitting at this table. Typical action to take is to stop auto acting when it is this player's turn.

Parameters:
table -
player -
playerData - game specific player data
